website_summaries.verdict: Specially designed with the younger crowd in mind, this option makes a great first bead maze. Safe, stable, and simple enough for babies aged one and over to enjoy.
pros: Chunky beads are easy for little fingers to grasp
Fitted with 4 suction cups to hold it in place
Compact size fits on most high chair trays
No rough parts or sharp edges
cons: A handful of owners were disappointed by the size

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!!!!!! Best toy for a 6 month old!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 month old LOVES this toy! It fits perfectly on her high chair tray and we can bring it to dinners with us to keep her occupied while we eat. It’s small enough to bring yet busy enough to keep her entertained. We love it as much as she does !!!!!! The suction cup base is effective to keep it in place no matter how hard she pulls it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would've had for all 5 kids!!! Mom-of-many approved!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, high quality toy! I bought this for my 8 month old to use while sitting in her high chair; I don't like electronic toys for the most part and was looking for a durable, sensory stimulating toy that would encourage imaginative play and problem solving -- this fits the bill!!! Structurally it is superbly made. It has withstood abusive 8 month old hands without showing wear, and the suction cups on this toy are insanely strong (it take ME some effort and finesse to release them)! This will definitely be purchased for future baby showers! I wish I would've had this for my other children (I have 5 children ranging in age up to 12 years old)!!!
customer_reviews.author: EMH

customer_reviews.title: the suction cups on the bottom are a nice touch. While fixing your baby’s food
customer_reviews.text: This toy is very well made; the suction cups on the bottom are a nice touch. While fixing your baby’s food, you can suction it to your baby’s highchair to keep them entertained. It was one of my granddaughter’s first toys after learning to sit, and she absolutely loved playing with it. I highly recommend purchasing this toy from the “Cubbie Lee Toy Company”.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy_H

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy alternative to a screen for your child when ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy alternative to a screen for your child when you're at a restaurant. We bought it for this purpose and for a plane ride. Unfortunately its a bit bulky for a diaper bag, but definitely worth bringing if you can make the room. The suction on the bottom is especially helpful for tables at a restaurant. We have a 10 month old, so their attention span isn't quite there, but I'm hopeful this toy will keep them entertained for many more years.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bead maze
customer_reviews.text: Love this maze.I was reluctant to buy as it doesn't look steady in picture but I am glad I was wrong. My 10 months old son loved it.Watching his little fingers play with bead is so much fun.He even found how to use that big flower shaped bead which looks useless but is not.Very well thought and nicely made bead maze.Wish the suction were better as it doesn't stick to the tray of Graco blossom 4-1 convertible high chair.
customer_reviews.author: alka anand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a highchair
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to entertain my son while I am cooking or need him in his highchair. He is nine months so currently everything gets thrown to the ground and I found myself playing 52 item pick up and never getting things done. With this fun toy he can play for a while and has no real change to throw it on the ground. Win! Win! Its well built and the diverse amount of colors and shapes keep him busy while learning different shapes and colors. Highly recommend this for any mom trying to get things done and keep child entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great claasic toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for my 9 month old and although he is a bit young for it, he does enjoy the maze and watching the blocks as we push them through. The only flaw in the toy is the suction cups. My baby is way too strong and can pull it out of the suction. Perhaps the base can be a big heavier? Overall though, it is a great compact classic toy!
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: So practical.
customer_reviews.text: I have an 11 month old and he's an active little guy. We use this on his high chair to keep him occupied while getting his meal ready and its small enough to squeeze into our diaper backpack to take to restaurants. We suction it to the table as soon as we are seated and he plays with it until our food comes. He's extremely strong and can get most suction items off of his tray/table and this has held up well. Great quality and would definitely recommend it to any of my mommy friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hancock

customer_reviews.title: 👍 👍
customer_reviews.text: Still loving this product. Great quality. Great price. Bought it first for my 1 year old, stuck it on his high chair and he loved it. Now it's on his table. I'm going to purchase as a gift and regift ours bc it still looks new. My only complaint is the size, it's small but it's still 5 star quality. Compared to Melissa and Doug, I choose Cubbie Lee.
customer_reviews.author: DGE

customer_reviews.title: I was a little worried about purchasing one without first making sure that it was good quality but this one did not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly well made product. I was a little worried about purchasing one without first making sure that it was good quality but this one did not disappoint. The colors are bight, the metal is well bent, the wood is well sealed in order to prevent splinters. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use suction
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this toy and the suction was a good idea however my baby always pulls on her toys and the pulled it until the suction gave and it hit her in the face. The toy is very sturdy and hard so it left a good mark. It’s a good toy but I don’t recommend using the suction unless your baby doesn’t like to try and move it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suction is horrible
customer_reviews.text: The suction on this is horrible. My 7m old pulls it off of her high chair tray and hits herself in the face with it. I tried sticking it to the stand and she still pulls it off. Both are very smooth and clean surfaces. She likes to play with it if I'm sitting on the floor with her, but then I dont have the convenience of the suction cups.
customer_reviews.author: Jess W.

customer_reviews.title: Can't get it to suction to anything
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I can't recommend this. I cannot get the suction to work on any surface. We have had it about 2 months and my now 13 month old has played with it a combined maybe 5 minutes. Other than not suctioning to anything, it seems like pretty good quality. But for whatever reason my son just doesn't play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My son is 7 months old and he absolutely loves this toy. We stuck it to his walker (it hasn’t come off a single time yet) and he plays for long periods of time. It’s amazing to watch the wheels turn in his head as he explores all the moving pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great hands on toy
customer_reviews.text: The size of this is small, but perfect!! Toddlers love these things, and ours is no exception. This is a great size for traveling with. We have taken it to the store with us, so he has something to do while we shop. It teaches hand-eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: No safe for kids! Paint and rust coming off this toy!
customer_reviews.text: Metal rods rusted right out of the box. The beads had a thick layer of black dust / dirt all over so I decided to clean them with baby wipes. As soon as I you clean each bead, all the paint came off. Imagine your baby eating the paint!! Sending this garbage right back!
customer_reviews.author: PMLANY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! It's not giant like most of the other ones I looked at so it fits on a shelf really well. I thought I wouldn't like the suction cups but I'm glad because otherwise it would fall over easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sariah Branham

customer_reviews.title: Great bead maze
customer_reviews.text: Great bead maze. My little one loves playing with this. A bit smaller than expected, but is a terrific educational toy
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for car ride
customer_reviews.text: My 2 years old son loves it. I was expecting a bigger toy. However, we also use this toy during a car ride and he keeps the attention to the toy for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for my one year old. She has enjoyed playing with it. I really like the suction cups at the bottom, very helpful! Overall seems to be a great quality item that will last many years =)
customer_reviews.author: BrentaNeas

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality toy! Perfect size for baby in a high chair, or Bunmbo seat with tray, the suction cups help keep it in place. Most importantly, my 7 month old enjoys playing with this toy. Very nice bead maze, I’m very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lissy

customer_reviews.title: and she can attach it to his high chair tray and he is happy playing with the beads while she cleans up the ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 1 year old grandson, and since it is at home with him (of course) I asked my daughter how he likes it...she told me he LOVES it, and she can attach it to his high chair tray and he is happy playing with the beads while she cleans up the kitchen...the best thing is that these beads are a long time toy! As my grandson grows, so will his capability of playing with it! Great delivery, right on time!
customer_reviews.author: MeeMee

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups are useless but toy sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Our little one year old loves this toy. We use it a lot on his high chair while he's waiting to eat. The auction cups are pretty useless, though. They are very flat and don't grip unless you wet them, and even then it slides across the plastic tray. If it stuck better I would give it five stars as it seems sturdy even after being dropped on the floor a few times. We've had no trouble with the paint coming off the beads as I saw on some other products. This toy hold the tot's attention and he loves spinning and pushing the beads.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Boatman

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it so much. Unfortunately, due to weather the packaged came completely soaked and damaged. The toy inside had no protection, so it got wet. I figured, it’s not a gift and for my child, no big deal. Wrong! I started to wipe it down with a dry paper towel and the paint started to come off. I looked at my hands and they were covered in paint. Definitely not something I want my child to play with as she puts everything in her mouth. Also, made in China label.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Play play play
customer_reviews.text: My son like this toy at his daycare. So I bought this which is a smaller version to the one at the daycare . He likes it .he plays with it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Seebuchanan

customer_reviews.title: I must have read the description incorrectly because this item was much smaller than expected but I like it. It has suction cups at the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it as a gift. I must have read the description incorrectly because this item was much smaller than expected but I like it. It has suction cups at the bottom to hold the toy in place because a toddler will pick it up and throw it around. Its a cute, small little toy that is easy for travel.
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Great toy to occupy toddlers while in the high chair!
customer_reviews.text: We put this on my grandson's high chair tray to give us some time to relax and finish eating when he's done. He loves the various parts that move around. We took it on vacation and it worked great in restaurants.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: No sharpe edges, beautiful vibrant colors, very sturdy and well made. It’s the size of 500 ml water bottle so perfect size for baby. My 10 months old likes it. Suction cups on the bottom didn’t work on the wooden table and floor. It slides and easily pulls off by baby. Although some beads are cracked and made me disappointed, it’s still a good toy for physical development. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups not so strong
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this more than I actually did. It would be the perfect size for her high chair table....but the suction cups are not that strong. At all. My 6 month old can pull it right up and she ends up decking herself in the face with the metal. Ouch!!!
customer_reviews.author: VAMars

customer_reviews.title: Poor Suction Power
customer_reviews.text: I give it 3 stars simply because this high chair toy can not remain in the table very stable. My 7 month old can easily get it off from the high chair table and hit his head pretty hard. I hope they can work out a better solution to make it more adhesive to the high chair table. Other than that, the toy is good for an infant.
customer_reviews.author: Yuan Huo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old loves this. Keeps him busy while I give him his puree's.
customer_reviews.author: MarketWizard

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this for my 11.5mo old for his Christmas present. He loves it! It's not big and bulky like I expected it to be (I didn't check the measurements). Seller is also very pleasant and committed to excellence. You have my business!
customer_reviews.author: AyElleEm

customer_reviews.title: The suction part does not work
customer_reviews.text: It’s just like pictured, nice toy but the suction is crap. It doesn’t suction at all which is super disappointing. It will suction for a second but the instant you touch it, it comes undone.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: My 11mo daughter absolutely loves moving these beads. She ...
customer_reviews.text: My 11mo daughter absolutely loves moving these beads. She doesn't move them with a purpose at the moment, but there are so many different pieces here, that you would be able to find your kid entertaining themselves all afternoon. Pieces move smoothly, and the toy is small enough that you can store away on a shelf and not take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it, so I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My baby likes it, so I'm happy. The suction power on this is INSANE though, a bit difficult to remove but not something I mind at all. Really great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Toy, Bad Suction
customer_reviews.text: My 8-month-old grandson likes to explore the beads on this toy. Unfortunately, I have to hold it because he can easily pull it off the high chair tray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's nice that it has suction cups on the bottom so ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy. She's only six months old, but she likes pushing around the beads. It's nice that it has suction cups on the bottom so it can be mounted to a table or children's desk.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: He always loves playing with the bead mazes at doctors offices so we knew it would be a great gift. It's the perfect size (not t
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 15 month old son as a Christmas present and he loves it. He always loves playing with the bead mazes at doctors offices so we knew it would be a great gift. It's the perfect size (not too big for our small house) and seems to be made really well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it! It’s sticks well to his high chair, so much so that I have to use something to pry the suction cups off of it for cleaning. He plays with it every time he’s in his high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: We love this toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old LOVES this toy. I love that it keeps her entertained while I prepare food. The suction cups are such a great feature. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: JLMB

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy that can grow with your baby. I bought it for a 6 month old (younger than the recommended age) and baby enjoys it very much. It is great for exploring and building motor skills. The beads are different colors, textures, and shapes. We use it on the highchair and walker. I should mention that the suction isn't the best but baby isn't able to pull it off alone.
customer_reviews.author: vernon palmer

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: No matter how perfectly flat the surface. This will NOT suction. My baby pulls it loose everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Emalie

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: This maze is very well made, haven't noticed any issues with it in a few months that we've had it. Kid loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! 7 month old plays with in highchair while I clean up after a meals. I do have to dab just a little water on cups to get a good solid stick on a clean surface , but it holds really well!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Love it but.........
customer_reviews.text: Suction does not work and it’s smaller than you think. Great quality otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer1

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. My 10 month old loved it as a gift. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Lindgren

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand daughter shes 8 months, shes very into the bright colors and moving the blocks, and tbe suction cups WOW they do stick :)
customer_reviews.author: sondra neace

customer_reviews.title: Won't stick
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT stick at all! I tried multiple surfaces and could not get it to stick to anything
customer_reviews.author: Alayna333

customer_reviews.title: Good toy, bad suction...
customer_reviews.text: Good toy, but the suction doesn't hold at all, maybe a few minutes, but it can be easily pulled off. My one year old can pull it right off of the table.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: The baby loved it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my granddaughter who absolutely loved it
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Wiz

customer_reviews.title: I love the bead maze
customer_reviews.text: I love the bead maze. Sturdy, well made and great for little hands. The suction cups make it easy to put on the table or high chair and not worry that it will go overboard! Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Braff

customer_reviews.title: 7 MONTH OLD ENJOYS THIS TOY GREAT FOR HIGH CHAIR/BABY WALKER
customer_reviews.text: Love!! It’s the perfect size to fit on my daughters joovy walker. She 7 months and seems to really enjoy moving around the beads on this and figuring out what in the world it is! Got her attention right away. I will do an update as the time goes by to see how long it will keep her attention for etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Best Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a top favorite toy in our house. It’s perfect for travel, great for restaurants, and keeps our sons attention every time. He loves it and so do we we!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have toy. Easy to travel with coz it’s small enough to pack.
customer_reviews.text: Suction is amazing. Kids don’t throw it all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Dube

customer_reviews.title: Not sure.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute toy but my daughter wasn’t into it. So, I’m not convinced it was a good buy. But your kid might be into it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it! Nice that it can attach to high chair, and to her closet mirror door too!
customer_reviews.author: DianaK

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the bead maze
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the bead maze. Sturdy construction. Solid wood base. Smooth beads that are easy to maneuver for little hands. Purchased this for my grand daughter. Keeps her occupied wherever we go. It's smaller than I anticipated hence the four stars, but the smaller size is good for portability. Would definitely purchase again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joyous Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Suction isn't great, but my toddler still loves it. We bought for his high chair but he just plays with it on the floor. Sturdy too, he likes to sit on it despite my attempts to stop him.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Built to Last!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and LOVE the strong suction! It fits on our 6 month old’s Bumbo table and entertains him for a long time. He also wrestles with it on the floor and it has held up great. Seems like it will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: MadSkill

customer_reviews.title: Great infant toy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our grandson. It 'works' fine, but as of yet, our grandson has not shown any interest in it which is not unusual. It takes him a bit before he warms-up to a new toy.
customer_reviews.author: Michele B. Hines

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves it! He plays with it every single day!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P. Treacy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Suctions works good but my 6 month old isn’t interested in this at all. Maybe she will like it when she’s older.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and keeps the baby busy for a long time she loves it having the suction cups on there is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves this maze
customer_reviews.text: The small size makes it very portable, and the suction cups work great. My daughter-in-law says my 1 year-old grandson loves this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Just like as seen in Dr's office only on a smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: Just like as seen in Dr's office only on a smaller scale, which makes it more convenient to take it on the go with you. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This thing really stays put on glass! I have it on our coffee table. Super cute and will keep your kiddo entertained. Planning on trying it out at a restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Grace

customer_reviews.title: Bead Maze Activity Cube
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right size to put in a baby chair tray. It has a suction cup. My little man will live the distraction of playing with it while eating.
customer_reviews.author: Kat H

customer_reviews.title: Nice maze
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 8mo old. She likes playing with it and mostly throwing it around. Durable and great suction cups
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: It's the best product for the price that I could find
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old daughter loves this toy. It's well made with solid wood spheres and cubes. It's the best product for the price that I could find.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with this product at first, but after a month of my little one playing with it one of the parts is popping out. Very sad about this because my little girl loves this but afraid to let her play with it incase it pops all of the way out.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an 8 month old to amuse herself in her highchair. I worked great and she loves it. It will keep her busy while I make dinner. I would recommend wetting the suction cups a bit because they stick better that way. Otherwise she can pull it off fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: tami bug

customer_reviews.title: Good material nice colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 16 months old son, he doesn't play so much with it but just because he prefers to run around throwing balls. The toy looks very nice, good material and nice colors. Not too big, good for playing in a high chair or in a car too.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: A toy that will play will for years.
customer_reviews.text: My grand baby loved playing with this toy. It brought back so many memories, my kids were always drawn to that to.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My LO isn't so interested and was quite bored with it extremely fast.

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old love this. it's not a toy that will probably ...
customer_reviews.text: my 1.5 year old love this. it's not a toy that will probably hold his attention for too much longer but for now it gets the job done when I need 15 minutes of time to occupy his time.
customer_reviews.author: Fee

customer_reviews.title: Not that exciting
customer_reviews.text: Good idea but not practical- kind of a boring toy
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bail

customer_reviews.text: Paint started chipping one week after return window closed, dangerous
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size for my 1-yr old grand daughter
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for my 1-yr old grand daughter. The suction cups on the bottom are very strong and keep the toy From tipping and slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Fery

customer_reviews.title: great for little fingers to learn fine motor skills
customer_reviews.text: Just right sized for my 9 mo old grandson. Doesn't stick/attach to my wooden coffee table but not a show stopper.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month enjoyed playing with it. Colorful, well made, sturdy. Size is perfect, not big not small. The suction on the base is awesome- stays straight right up, I don't have to keep on helping her to keep it up:) Arrived very quick. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KS.

customer_reviews.title: A great little toy for my niece
customer_reviews.text: A great little toy for my niece! Nice quality and well built. She will love it for a long time!

customer_reviews.title: Great classic toy in portable size
customer_reviews.text: Great classic toy, good size for my 1 yr old boy as he likes to move it around but not too big that he'll trip over it while carrying it and walking. I hope he'll have fun with it for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Annibelle Lin

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction, keeps little one entertained!
customer_reviews.text: The suction is SO strong I love it! The toy keeps my little one amused while he eats! Very good quality built and strongly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy. It’s sturdy and well made.

customer_reviews.text: It's a pain in the butt to clean. There should be a protective coating on the wood that's also safe for children.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Good suction, good quality, very engaging
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 6 month old daughter. We have it attached to her Joovy Spoon walker tray. Stays suctioned very securely and is very engaging. Love the quality of these wooden toys! They will last for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Schoenfeldt

customer_reviews.title: My 8 month old son loves this. he needed ...
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old son loves this. he needed some toys that he can learn from and manipulate and interact with and this fits the bill perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Nicola M Brown

customer_reviews.title: High quality with strong suction
customer_reviews.text: Excellent suction ability! Works great on high chair and on play mat. My 4 month old is fascinated by this toy! High quality and engaging!
customer_reviews.author: Jami Harms

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than when viewed on site. Small enough to fit on high chair tray. Had thought would be large enough to play with on floor. Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: My son absolutely loves this toy! We stuck it ...
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this toy! We stuck it to his walker and also move it to his high chair for entertainment. He loves spinning the different beads and very helpful while teaching and learning colors.
customer_reviews.author: Avi Kauderer

product_meta.title: Premium Bead Maze for Baby, Toddler, with Strong Suction Cups & Wooden Roller Coaster Sliding Beads on Durable Wire Frames - Classic Developmental Activity Toy for Babies, 1 & 2 Year Olds
feature_bullets: GREAT FOR PHYSICAL & MENTAL DEVELOPMENT - One of the great classic baby toys, this premium solid wood and wire bead roller coaster maze is beautifully crafted and includes 4 suction cups to stick it to smooth, flat surfaces. This is a classic baby and toddler toy that helps develop color and shape recognition, fine motor skills and spatial reasoning in your little loved one. Not only do babies and toddlers love playing with it, but it supports their critical mental development!

SAFE TO PLAY WITH - Only non-toxic paint is used, no choking hazards, and all the pieces are sanded smooth so there are no rough edges to give splinters. Like every Cubbie Lee toy, this toy meet or exceeds the strict product safety regulations set forth by the Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) within the ASTM F963 regulations for children's toys for ages infant to 3, and is certified safe by 3rd-party lab testing. It measures 6”W x 8”L x 8.5”H.

WILL NOT FALL APART - SUPERIOR QUALITY & DESIGN - When you touch this premium baby bead maze you'll feel the difference in quality. Handcrafted to be an heirloom toy, you'll notice the weight and strength of the solid wood, the vibrant colors and smooth finish. Like all Cubbie Lee kids toys, this toy is built to last for years and to be played with by multiple children! Unlike other cheap baby bead mazes on the market, this toy is durable enough to last through multiple children!

MAKES A PERFECT GIFT - This wood and wire roller coaster toy is a timeless gift. You cannot go wrong purchasing it for a toddler or as a baby 12 month old toy. It's even a great baby shower gift, as it is a cute little toy that looks great on the nursery shelf until the baby is ready to play with it. This bead maze is a similar shape and size to other toy popular toy brands like Melissa and Doug, Hape and Fisher Price bead mazes, but is built with superior quality and durability.

YOUR PURCHASE IS RISK-FREE - Did you know that every Cubbie Lee toy is backed by an industry-leading 5-year warranty? Not only are you covered by a 30 day moneyback guarantee, but if anything goes wrong with the toy within the first 5 years, simply contact Cubbie Lee Toys and they will fix or replace it at no cost to you. Risk-free purchase!
